Introduction

Kawai Ruka is a Japanese rapper and dancer under YG Entertainment. She is best known as the oldest, main dancer, and main rapper of the girl group BABYMONSTER.

Before becoming a YG Entertainment trainee, Ruka used to be a Japanese idol. As one of the founding members of the Japanese idol group Shibu3 project, Ruka made her debut on March 26, 2017, as a member of the Blue Class. In 2018, she eventually departed the group.

On February 5, 2023, Ruka was revealed as the seventh and last member of BABYMONSTER. The group officially debuted on March 31, 2024, with their mini album "BABYMONS7ER".

Fun facts

1
Along with Asa, Ruka is one of the first Japanese female idols to debut under YG Entertainment.
…
2
One of the dance instructors, LEEJUNG, praised Ruka for her dance experience and understanding. The former CEO of YG Entertainment was so impressed by her skills that he never felt the need to advise her on dancing.
…
3
She has a strong passion for dance and is an excellent dancer.
…
4
Ruka easily gets scared.
…
5
She sang DJ Khaled’s “Top Off” featuring JAY Z, Future, and Beyoncé during her audition.
…
6
She appeared in the “Happy Halloween!” MV by Ueda Atsumi.
…
7
Ruka's favourite song of 2024 was "Die With A Smile" by Lady Gaga & Bruno Mars
